Text: QGradeASaleFaresandAPlusRewardsPromotionAirTran Airways is doing its part to get America flying again Weve made the fastest free ticket on earth twice as fast Now through the end of the year when you fly three roundtrips well give you a free roundtrip coach ticket to anywhere we fly We just wanted to remind you that our Grade A sale fares require a day advance purchase and are good for travel through February But you must buy your tickets by this Wednesday night October Book your tickets online at where our Grade A sale fares are discounted an extra Here are just a few examples of
